description: '''David Samuel Pike''' (March 23, 1938 â€“ October 3, 2015) was an American jazz [[vibraphone]] and [[marimba]] player. He appeared on many albums by [[Nick Brignola]], [[Paul Bley]] and [[Kenny Clarke]], [[Bill Evans]], and [[Herbie Mann]]. He also recorded extensively as leader, including a number of albums on [[MPS Records]].
